content.text:
I need your help, I am stuck in a mapworld environment. 
Your task is to help me reach an escape room. I do not know what the escape room looks like. 
But fortunately, you have an image of the escape room with you. I will explore each room here and ask you a few QUESTIONS
to verify if we have the same image or not, thus verifying if I am in the Escape Room or not.

First start by describing the image that you have, Respond in the following format
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image that you have

Then if I ask a QUESTION, the respond appropriately based on your image in the following format
ANSWER: your Answer

message.content:
DESCRIPTION: The image shows a set of ornate, wooden double doors. The doors have rectangular frosted glass panels with a floral design etched into them. Each door has a brass handle. To the left of the doors is a wicker bookshelf filled with papers and files. A wooden banister with a decorative finial is visible on the right side of the image, and a glimpse of a floral arrangement can be seen beyond it. The overall setting appears to be an older building or hallway.



Now, ask

content.text:
You are stuck in a mapworld environment containing several rooms. 
Your task is to explore this world and reach an escape room.
You are always given an image of the current room you are in. 
I have an image of the Escape Room, this is an initial description of my image - DESCRIPTION: The image shows a set of ornate, wooden double doors. The doors have rectangular frosted glass panels with a floral design etched into them. Each door has a brass handle. To the left of the doors is a wicker bookshelf filled with papers and files. A wooden banister with a decorative finial is visible on the right side of the image, and a glimpse of a floral arrangement can be seen beyond it. The overall setting appears to be an older building or hallway.



Now, ask.

Based on my description and the image given, you now have three options

First Option - If you think that the description of my image matches the image you have, i.e.
you are in the escape room then respond with one word - ESCAPE.

Second Option - If you think you need more details from my image - respond in the following format
QUESTION: Ask details about the image I have to verify if we have the same image or not

Third Option - If you think you are in a different room than what I have, i.e we are seeing different images,
then you can make a move in following Directions - ['north', 'east']. Respond in the following format
MOVE: direction - Here direction can be one of {north, south, east, west}

message.content: QUESTION: Are there any windows visible in the image? If so, can you describe their shape and location? Also, is there any distinct furniture or decor *besides* the bookshelf, banister, and floral arrangement?

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a set of ornate, wooden double doors. The doors have rectangular frosted glass panels with a floral design etched into them. Each door has a brass handle. To the left of the doors is a wicker bookshelf filled with papers and files. A wooden banister with a decorative finial is visible on the right side of the image, and a glimpse of a floral arrangement can be seen beyond it. The overall setting appears to be an older building or hallway.



Now, ask

content.text: question: are there any windows visible in the image? if so, can you describe their shape and location? also, is there any distinct furniture or decor *besides* the bookshelf, banister, and floral arrangement?

message.content:
ANSWER: No, there are no visible windows in the image. 

Regarding other distinct furniture or decor, there is a small section of wallpaper visible on the wall to the right of the doors. It has a subtle floral pattern. Additionally, a portion of what appears to be a white radiator is visible beneath the banister. Beyond that, the image primarily focuses on the doors and the immediate surrounding elements.

content.text: question: can you describe the doors in more detail? specifically, what material do they appear to be made of, and are there any visible hinges or decorative elements on the doors themselves (besides the frosted glass and handles)? also, what color is the wallpaper?

message.content:
ANSWER: The doors appear to be made of a rich, dark wood – possibly mahogany or a similar hardwood. I can see visible hinges on the doors, they are a darker metal, likely iron or a blackened steel. There's also a subtle raised paneling detail around the frosted glass sections, adding to the ornate design.

The wallpaper is a very pale yellow or cream color, with a repeating small floral pattern.

MOVE: north
